PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-07691998-05-010HERITAGE,  PSC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to (a) the PUBLIC SERVICE OFFICIAL LANGUAGES EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER and to (b) the PUBLIC SERVICE OFFICIAL LANGUAGES APPOINTMENT REGULATIONS whereby unilingual candidates for bilingual positions in the Executive Group will not have to demonstrate their potential to attain the required proficiency in the other official language through government- financed training, effective May 1, 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0276 Publication Date: 1998-05-13
Attachments
